extends java.lang.Object
    Class for sending actionbar to players

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void broadcast(java.lang.String message)
      Sends an action bar with the provide message to all the players online.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public static void send(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        java.lang.String message)
        Sends an action bar message to the provided Player.

        Note that the length message message must be < 63, if the length of the provided message is higher than 63, that it will limited.

        Parameters:
        player - Player that will receive the message.
        message - Message to send.

      • broadcast

        public static void broadcast(java.lang.String message)
        Sends an action bar with the provide message to all the players online.

        Parameters:
        message - Message to send.
        See Also:
        send(Player, String)
